title: Maker Space-Based Language Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Foundational Language Education Theory
context.additional_context: Exploration of makerspace approaches for language education innovation targeting working professionals.

learning_goals: Creation of a language project proposal applying the design thinking process in a makerspace environment.
Production of language learning tools using digital fabrication tools (3D modeling, laser cutting, etc.).
Development of language learning content prototypes incorporating peer feedback via collaboration platforms.

resources: Maker Space Basic Equipment (3D Printer, Laser Cutter, Electronics Workbench Kit)
Digital Fabrication Software (Adobe Creative Cloud, Tinkercad, Fusion 360)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
